messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So we had 2 confirmed bloodbrothers in sec ready for execution we had proof via messages on their pdas  so i went to see the execution and standing 2 tiles away from one of the brothers one started beeping,so i backed away and 2 seconds later he exploded so i ran for my dear life and i survived i dont know how especial with half of the entirity of sec being blown into bits

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Its so funny because i found a beacon on lavalnd so i teled there and turns out it was a syndi base ship lol!
